products.name: DRT 1.1 Bike
products.description: Made for off-road adventures, the Co-op Cycles DRT 1.1 features a versatile 3 x 8 drivetrain and the solid stopping power of hydraulic disc brakes, giving new riders the perfect amount of control.

products.name: Cannondale Trail 7
products.description: With a lightweight Trail frame you can handle confidently, reliable Shimano gearing and hydraulic disc brakes, the Cannondale Trail 7 is a great entry into the high-performance mountain biking world.

products.name: Salsa Timberjack NX1
products.description: The Salsa Timberjack NX1 27.5+ is a hardtail mountain bike that's equally at home pushing the limits on singletrack as it is bikepacking to places you've yet to discover.

products.name: GHOST Kato FS
products.description: Soak up the bumps with the 2018 GHOST Kato FS 3.7 27.5 bike, which supplies full-suspension fun for mountain biking adventures.

products.name: SLAMR X 9 LC 29er
products.description: Blending speed, control, durability and agility for your trail adventures, the GHOST SLAMR X9 LC 29er bike boasts an ultralight carbon fiber frame, aluminum alloy swing arm and a burly suspension.
